data.meta_description: Alpha FMC Announces Acquisition of APAC Asset and Wealth Management Specialist Consultancy, Shoreline
data.text:
Client Reporting continues to be a highly complex and labour intensive process across the Asset Management industry. Alpha has engaged with Asset Managers, Asset Owners and Client Reporting vendors to identify the key focus areas for Client Reporting in 2023. In this article Alpha FMC experts Chyavan Rees, Thomas Goldwater and Alex Sabato discuss perspectives on Client Reporting as a 'hygiene factor' that should drive focus on operational efficiency and scalability in the operating model. Read: https://lnkd.in/ebNCDhqw #assetmanagement #clientreporting #assetowners #operationalefficiency #operatingmodel

On the 1st of January 2022, the FCA introduced the Investment Firm Prudential Regime (IFPR) to enhance the prudential supervision of investment firms. One year on, it is important to assess whether firms' Internal Capital Adequacy and Risk Assessments (ICARAs) and supporting documentation and processes meet FCA expectations and standards. Failure to complete a compliant and proportionate ICARA can result in material capital and liquidity impacts, as well as regulatory scrutiny. To help firms navigate this complex regulatory landscape, Alpha FMC experts Bernardo Castel-Branco and Awat Rahimi offer some critical considerations that firms should take into account. Read: https://lnkd.in/e-JaPiZT #IFPR #regulation #investmentmanagement #ICARA #prudential

In 2023, ESG is no longer a simple hype. It is a major and unmissable trend for the Asset Management Industry. Alpha FMC's Global CEO Luc Baqué was interviewed by Nicolas Doze on BFM Business. Please see a link to the video below. Watch: https://lnkd.in/ezH8-gdP #assetmanagement #ESG #sustainableinvestment #futureoffinance Disclaimer: The interview is in French

As interest in LLMs like ChatGPT takes off across the industry, it is imperative for managers to educate themselves on both the capabilities and the limitations of these models. In our latest whitepaper, Natalie M., Harry Taylor, Greg Beazley, and Nigel Musiza demystify the workings of ChatGPT to demonstrate how managers can best leverage this new wave of AI while taking into account its limitations and potential pitfalls. Click the link below to read more! #assetmanagement #datascience #LLMs #ChatGPT #AI #datadriven Link: https://lnkd.in/e3HAU2z5

Across the platform market, platforms are growing concerned by the proliferation of the adviser-as-platform model. In the second article of our two-part enterprise platform series, Alpha FMC's Jake Reed, Malak Hassaballa, Bradley Northrop and Duncan M Ng'enda discuss the threat to platforms created by advisers disintermediating traditional platforms and running their own, what this means for the platform market and how platforms are responding to the threat. Read: https://lnkd.in/gQCMkGau #enterpriseplatforms #platforms #adviserasplatform

Asset Managers are shifting towards Digital Distribution to reach clients through multiple channels other than traditional Sales teams. Alpha FMC’s Antonia Bos and Yvie Lewis explore the importance of this approach and offer insights on how to successfully navigate the digital landscape to provide a differentiating product experience. Read: https://lnkd.in/evEr7xP2 #digitaldistribution #distributionchannels #distribution #clientexperience #productexperience #investmentproducts

In 2023, Asset Managers are facing the difficult task of balancing transformational agendas against an uncertain market climate and constrained budgets. Alpha FMC's Head of Digital & Agile Kevin O'Shaughnessy and Adam Starkey-Smith look at how Investment Managers need to ensure they are set up to maximize the effectiveness of their change agendas to remain competitive in the market. Read: https://lnkd.in/eZBxeaue #Digital #Agile #Value #Change #AssetManagement

As the asset management industry heads into a period of uncertainty, firms that are effectively able to leverage data science and analytics to steer their business will have a clear competitive advantage. Natalie M., Harry Taylor, Sam Gevirtz, Kerri Heidemann, and Shreya M. explore how firms can build a foundational data science and analytics toolkit to combat industry and market challenges while setting themselves up for future success. Read more: https://lnkd.in/edHu-ZJf #datascience #analytics #assetmanagement #datadriven #insights #data
